title: Bug 14047: StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
OB: Appending N lines to StyledText in word wrap mode results in N redraws of the entire client area.
EB: The StyledText should only redraw the region affected by the text change, minimizing the redraws of the entire client area during text change with word wrap.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Enable word wrap mode in the StyledText.
3. Append N lines to the StyledText.
4. Observe the redraw behavior of the client area during the text change.
